minecraft:written_book_content.title: Fisherman's Tale
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Minecraft
pages: {"text":"The oceans are a vast landscape of endless sea. Whilst these waters may seem calm at first, there is to be a warning; an ancient, mythological creature - resembling a squid, but far more dangerous, its glowing texture acting as a captivating signal,"}

{"text":"and a warning for the weary.

Beware, lest this forboding squid come for you next."}
